definition: A physical object commonly utilized for the purpose of playing back recorded audio, typically in a circular shape with grooves that contain the audio information.

examples.english: My vinyl record collection is very large.

examples.german: Die Schallplatte dreht sich auf dem Plattenspieler.
examples.english: The vinyl record is spinning on the turntable.

examples.german: Ich höre gerne Musik von Schallplatten.
examples.english: I enjoy listening to music from vinyl records.
The vinyl record has a scratch.
